page.title: 04GLYNARTHEN, DYFED
page.content: My name is Melva, I have one sister named Linda. I live at{Waunfawr}I'm 10 years old this year. My mother and father work on the farm. We have{116} {Milking cows.}We have one pet cow called Spoti nose, we can ride on her back. I like horses. We have 2 horses. I ride and jump with a horse named Star. I like dogs as well. We have seven bitches.we have a pig and 13 cats. My sister goes to{Llandysul {school and I go to Glynarthen.}I like hand-making animals and birds. We have a pet black and white rabbit named Snoopy. Melva Owen aged 9. See p.2 for translation into welsh.
